summary: The relationship between a father and daughter is complicated by the arrival of a handsome young man.
cast: Alex Descas|Mati Diop|Nicole Dogué|Grégoire Colin|Julieth Mars Toussaint|Adèle Ado|Jean-Christophe Folly|Ingrid Caven|Mario Canonge|Stéphane Pocrain|Mary Pie|Eriq Ebouaney|Malaïka Marie-Jeanne|Jean-Luc Joseph|Giscard Bouchotte|Virgile Elana|Djédjé Apali|Luvinski Atche|Tony Harrisson|Adama Niane|David Saada|Meyen Ravine|Thomas Murviel|Paul Begba|Sylvana Martel|Cheikh Toure|Anne Makangila-Lebo|Jacqueline Andrieux|Melanie Petzold|Mani El Ozale|Moulaye Diarra
title: 35 rhums
